Instruction: Blend flour, eggs, and milk together in a blender until smooth. Allow to rest for 1 hour, then place butter in a casserole dish and melt it. Pour in the batter.
Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Bake the pudding in the preheated oven for 20 minutes, then reduce the temperature to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) and continue baking for an additional 15 minutes. Once golden, cut and serve.
